QuestData.Title: The Flamebinders' Secrets
QuestData.Description: Even as the Alliance cowards attack our positions, the Dragonflayer vrykul outpost of Voldrune, to the southeast, prepares for war. The vrykul are far from the strongest enemy we face here, but we must eliminate them before they can truly threaten us.$B$BTheir most powerful warriors are permitted to ride half-trained proto-drakes into battle. To control the beasts, their flamebinders create powerful talismans. You'll need to slay them and take the talismans if our plan is to work.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 3 Flame-Imbued Talismans to Sergeant Nazgrim at Conquest Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: With the power of the talismans, the drake has no choice but to obey your commands. The thane's fate is sealed.
